Class UserServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.service.impl.AbstractService

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

public class UserServiceImpl
extends AbstractService
implements UserService, UserDAOAware, GlobalServiceAware
